import { Formik, Field, Form, ErrorMessage } from 'formik' import schema2 from './schema2' import '../Styles/modal/modal.css' import swal from 'sweetalert'; const ModalForm = ({ id='modal', onClose = () => {}, Children}) => { const handleOutsideClick = (e) => { if(e.target.id === id) onClose(); } function onSubmit(values,{ resetForm }){ console.log(values) swal("Formulário preenchido!", "Em breve entraremos em contato!", "success"); resetForm({ values: '' }) onClose() } return(
(

{Children}
) } export default ModalForm
